scenario: Angry user asking for a refund

turns.content: Hi, I want a refund. Your product broke in two days.
I'm sorry to hear that. Can you share your order ID so I can check eligibility?
Order #A123. I also emailed support yesterday.
Thanks. I see your order. Our policy allows refunds within 30 days for defects. I’ve created ticket RMA-4382; you’ll receive a prepaid label via email.

scenario: Customer wants to change shipping address

turns.content: Can I change my shipping address before it ships?
Yes, if your order hasn’t shipped yet. What’s your order number?
Great, it’s still pending. Please share the new address and I’ll update it now.
Does the premium plan include SSO?
Yes, SSO is included in Business and Enterprise tiers. Premium requires the SSO add-on.
A 99.9% uptime SLA is included for Enterprise. Premium doesn’t include an SLA by default.
